name: Pageable
overview:
Started in 2009, Pageable is a hosted business page that allows you to create and promote your special offers anytime you want. No more waiting for a webmaster to update your content. No more giving 50% of your sales revenue to a third party deal site. With Pageable, you can easily create, update and post your own deals anytime you want. Itâ€™s the freedom you will get from owning your own deal page without the coding responsibilities. We take care of the design, programming and hosting for you. This way you can focus on what is truly important, which is the art of making money.

There are 4 simple steps in getting started:

  1. Pick a plan. We offer different plans to suit your needs and your budget. From the small mom and pop businesses shops to enterprise-level companies, we have the plan for you.

  2. Choose your design. No worries, you donâ€™t have to know how to design. Just pick and choose a theme for your deal page from our templates gallery and youâ€™ll be halfway to getting your page up and selling.

  3. Add your product. Tell your customers why they should buy your product. But itâ€™s not that hard. We know theyâ€™re buying because they love a good deal and you want to give it to them. Drop in photo for the hook, line and sinker.

  4. Start doing business. Launch your deal page, and you are ready to go. Advertise using social media like Facebook and Twitter as well as letting your database know about it through email marketing

Visit www.pageable.com to learn more!
